title: Pompeo posts a picture
author: VD
content_html:
An interesting choice under the circumstances, to be sure. Note that he’s down to three-minute intervals. UPDATE: Make that one-minute intervals.

  • A few final thoughts: The United States of America is the greatest country in the history of civilization.
  • There are consequences for interfering in the democratic process. Starting today, we are imposing visa restrictions on those involved in election interference in Tanzania. We remain committed to working together to advance democracy and mutual prosperity for both our countries.
content_text:
An interesting choice
under the circumstances, to be sure. Note that he’s down to three-minute intervals.
UPDATE:
Make that one-minute intervals.
A few final thoughts: The United States of America is the greatest country in the history of civilization.
There are consequences for interfering in the democratic process. Starting today, we are imposing visa restrictions on those involved in election interference in Tanzania. We remain committed to working together to advance democracy and mutual prosperity for both our countries.
